alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 2:38PM CST until March 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Another Round of Snow Expected This Afternoon Through Sunday... .A band of light to moderate snow moves late this afternoon, persisting through Sunday. The potential for higher snowfall accumulations Sunday afternoon in Central Wisconsin continues, but the exact location of this snow band remains in question. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST THIS EVENING TO 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Widespread total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Clark County. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST this evening to 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be slippery to hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
